AcceptedEventRelation.name: AcceptedEventRelation
AcceptedEventRelation.description: Represents event participants (invitees or attendees) with the status Accepted for a given event.

EventId.description: Indicates the ID of the event.

RelationId.description: Indicates the ID of the invitee.

RespondedDate.description: Indicates the most recent date and time when the invitee accepted an invitation to the event.

Response.description: Indicates the content of the response field. Label is Comment.

Type.description: Indicates whether the invitee is a user, lead or contact, or resource.
